Interface SIL_HeaterOperationI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HeaterOperationI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaterElectricitySILModel, HeaterStateSILModel, HeaterTemperatureSILModel

    public interface SIL_HeaterOperationI
extends HeaterOperationI
    The class HeaterOperationI defines the common operation used by events to execute on the heater models.

    Description

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentHeatingPower

        void setCurrentHeatingPower(double newPower,
                            fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time t)
        set the current heating power of the heater to newPower.

        Contract

         pre     newPower >= 0.0 && newPower <= MAX_HEATING_POWER
 post    getCurrentHeatingPower() == newPower
        Parameters:
        newPower - the new power in watts to be set on the heater.
        t - time at which the new power is set.
